sentences.en: That, plus a couple more foundational classes, and you will definitely be ready for my seminar.
sentences.cn: 具备了那些条件，再加上一些基础课程，你就一定能够参加我的研讨会了。

sentences.en: First, you need some good foundational knowledge claims, and then the rest of the knowledge claims can be based on these.
sentences.cn: 首先，你需要一些好的基础知识主张，然后剩下的知识主张可以基于它们。

sentences.en: Now, as to what kinds of knowledge claims are foundational, well, that's where this gets particularly interesting, in fact it sort of depends on which philosopher you ask.
sentences.cn: 至于什么样的知识主张是基础性的，这就是这个问题特别有趣的地方，事实上这取决于你问的是哪个哲学家。
